False.

The person below me wonders about my unhealthy obsession with hexagon related questions

I didn't until you mentioned that you had on obsession with them. Paging Dr. Freud!

The user below me has never seen "Best in Show"
True, the user below me has not landed on Gilly yet.

True.

The user below me is an enthusiast for proper lawn maintenance.

Sorta I think it should look nice but not have to pay 99999 a year to keep it perfect

the user below me is a digitoxin fan

A digiwhat now?

The User below me regularly prays to the great lord Gaben.

Ew, no.

TUBM owns more than 20 video games.

False.

The user below me has a YouTube channel

Correct!

TUBM does NOT have a Facebook account.

Correct.

The user below me actually doesn't mind spiders.

True. Cockroaches on the other hand...

The user below me doesn't like coffee.

ewwwww

idk how people can like coffee, the smell alone is horrendous.

the user below me has never landed on Moho.

edit: ninja successful

Edited April 22, 2015 by Deadpangod3

Heck no, I'm 42% coffee by mass. Ninja'd

I've landed on Moho. The landing isn't bad, but getting there in the first place...

The user below me is taller than 6'0" (183cm).

Correct. 207 cm (6'9.5", I think). Yes, the weather is nice up here. And yes, I do have a problem with door frames

The user below me has had a lucid dream.

Yeah but they last like 5 seconds. I really hate the Hyper-Realistic ones where you know you're asleep, and you're trying to wake up. For once, I was happy to hear my alarm clock.

The user below me lives in Canada

I wish, this country is full of idiots and rude people (yes, I am looking at you, Jake ******* and Micah *******) and we do not use metric Ã¢ËœÂ¹.

The user below me always has on glasses (aside from sleeping and showering, of course).

Unfortunately, yes.

The user below me plays guitar.

Nope, viola- a long time ago.

The user below me plays KSP on steam.

Nope. I got it on the store.

The user below me can't read music.

Only treble cleft.

The user below me is HYPED FOR 1.0!!
Well that was kind of given. Well then... the user below me has not gone to the inland KSC easter egg.

Oh yes I have. If you mean crashing into it with a plane.

The user below me likes cake.
